description_carte: Libra judges with a corrupted scale. Justice is a forgotten concept in her dark domain.
description_visuelle: A blindfolded figure holding a pair of scales. One side is overflowing with gold and jewels, the other is empty and stained with blood. Black smoke emanates from the scales.

skills.name: Dark Judgment
skills.description: Deals darkness damage based on target's missing HP.

skills.name: Siphon Life
skills.description: Deals darkness damage and heals Libra.

skills.name: Veil of Shadows
skills.description: Increases Libra's vit and evasion chance.

skills.name: Balance of Souls
skills.description: Deals massive darkness damage and applies a debuff that increases damage taken.

skills.name: Whispers of Doubt
skills.description: Reduces the target's attack and defense.
